representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 14496-2:2004. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 2: Visual. Core Profile (formal name); MPEG-4, Visual Coding, Core Profile (common name)
representation_information.description: MPEG-4 video encoding useful in higher-quality interactive services and supports mobile broadcast services.
